00032 /**
00033  * @brief Supply a little how/what/why about the algorithms this
00034  * class performs and what parameters it takes.
00035  * @return SelfDoc
00036  */
00037 SelfDoc CNAnalysisMethodGenotype::explainSelf()
00038 {
00039     CNAnalysisMethodGenotype obj;
00040     SelfDoc doc;
00041     doc.setDocName(obj.getType());
00042     doc.setDocDescription(obj.getDescription());
00043     doc.setDocOptions(obj.getDefaultDocOptions());
00044     return doc;
00045 }

00047 /**
00048  * @brief Default Getter method for parameters and their documentation.
00049  * @return map of parameters and their descriptions.
00050  */
00051 std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> CNAnalysisMethodGenotype::getDefaultDocOptions()
00052 {
00053   std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00054 
00055   // SelfDoc::Opt(name, type, value, default, min, max, description)
00056 /*
00057   example: 
00058   SelfDoc::Opt lohCN_errorrate = {"lohCN_errorrate", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.05", "0.05", "NA", "NA", "LOH CN Error Rate"};
00059   opts.push_back(lohCN_errorrate);
00060 
00061 
00062 */
00063   return opts;
00064 }

00066 /**
00067  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00068  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00069  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00070  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00071  *
00072  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00073  *
00074  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00075  */
00076 SelfCreate* CNAnalysisMethodGenotype::newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string>& params)
00077 {
00078     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00079     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00080     CNAnalysisMethodGenotype* pMethod = new CNAnalysisMethodGenotype();
00081     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00082 /* example
00083     pMethod->m_dLohCNErrorRate = setupDoubleParameter("lohCN_errorrate", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00084 */
00085     return pMethod;
00086 }

00089 CNAnalysisMethodGenotype::CNAnalysisMethodGenotype()

00099 /**
00100  * @brief run the analysis
00101  */
00102 void CNAnalysisMethodGenotype::run()
00103 {
00104     Verbose::out(1, "MAJOR PROGRESS UPDATE: Calculating SNP Data.");
00105     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodGenotype::run(...) start");
00106     isSetup();
00107 
00108     imputeUncalledCNstateForSNPs(getProbeSets());  // Assumes that probesets are Chromosome/Position ordered.
00109 
00110     getProbeSets()->quickSort(0);   // Sorted by ProbeSet Name.  Needed to load priors. 
00111     calculateGenotypes();
00112 
00113     if (m_pEngine->getEngineName() == "CNCytoEngine" && !m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2"))
00114     {
00115         getExperiment()->setCallRate(calculateCallRate());
00116     }
00117 
00118     getProbeSets()->quickSort(1);   // sorted by Chromosome then position
00119 
00120     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodGenotype::run(...) end");
00121 }

00123 
00124 float CNAnalysisMethodGenotype::calculateCallRate()
00125 {
00126     unsigned int totalCount = 0;
00127     unsigned int callCount = 0;
00128     for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; iProbeSetIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount(); iProbeSetIndex++)
00129     {
00130         // the three if clauses here (isProcess, SNP, confidence)
00131         // should sync up with if clauses in CNReporterCychp::writeGenInfoDataSet()
00132         CNProbeSet* p = (*getProbeSets())[iProbeSetIndex];
00133         if (!p->isProcess()) {
00134             continue;
00135         }
00136         if (p->processAsSNP())
00137         {
00138             totalCount++;
00139             float fConfidenceThreshold = CNAnalysisMethod::getConfidenceThreshold(m_pEngine->getOpt("brlmmp-parameters"));
00140             if (p->getGenotypeConfidence() >= fConfidenceThreshold) {
00141                 // count as ALLELE_NO_CALL
00142                 continue;
00143             }
00144             if (p->getGenotypeCallCode() != (char)ALLELE_NO_CALL)
00145             {
00146                 callCount++;
00147             }
00148         }
00149     }
00150     return callCount/(float)totalCount;
00151 }
00152 
00153 
00154 void CNAnalysisMethodGenotype::imputeUncalledCNstateForSNPs(CNProbeSetArray* pvProbeSets)
00155 {
00156 
00157     //  The algorithm is to advance up the genome until we hit the X chromosome.  
00158     //  We assume that the PAR region is a contiguous initial segment of the X chromosome 
00159     //  and we impute a CN call of 2 for all markers in this region.
00160     //
00161 
00162 
00163     //  Here we advance up to the X chromosome.
00164     CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = NULL;
00165     int iXChrBeginIndex=-1;
00166 
00167     int iIndex=0;
00168     for (; iIndex < pvProbeSets->getCount(); iIndex++)  
00169     {
00170         pobjProbeSet=pvProbeSets->getAt(iIndex);
00171         if(pobjProbeSet->getChromosome()==m_iXChromosome)
00172         {
00173             iXChrBeginIndex = iIndex;
00174             break;
00175         }
00176         
00177     }
00178    
00179 
00180     // Here we set the imputed CN state to 2 for all markers in the PAR region. 
00181     iIndex = iXChrBeginIndex;
00182     pobjProbeSet = pvProbeSets->getAt(iIndex);
00183 
00184     if(!(pobjProbeSet->isPseudoAutosomalRegion()))
00185     {
00186         Err::errAbort("PAR region is not at beginning of X chromosome as assumed by genotyping algorithm.");
00187     }
00188 
00189     while(pobjProbeSet->isPseudoAutosomalRegion())
00190     {
00191         pobjProbeSet->setImputedCNState(2);
00192         iIndex++;
00193         pobjProbeSet = pvProbeSets->getAt(iIndex);
00194     }
00195 
00196     //  Here iBeginIndex points to the first marker outside of the PAR region.
00197     int iBeginIndex = iIndex;
00198 
00199 
00200     // Here we advance up the genome and check whether the separation of adjacent markers is greater that the
00201     // distance we expect across the centromere.  If it is we we pause and impute CN states to markers up to iIndex.
00202     // Note that iIndex points to the last element in a block, so iBeginIndex is advanced one beyond this point.
00203     // We hit an end when iIndex is advanced to one beyond the X chromosome.  We then impute this last block outside the loop. 
00204     // One important thing to note is that we impute the upper and lower bounds of each block.
00205     while(pvProbeSets->getAt(iIndex)->getChromosome() == m_iXChromosome )
00206     {
00207         if ( (pvProbeSets->getAt(iIndex+1)->getPosition() - pvProbeSets->getAt(iIndex)->getPosition()) > m_iSeparation)
00208         {
00209               impute(iBeginIndex, iIndex, pvProbeSets); 
00210               iBeginIndex = iIndex+1;
00211         }    
00212         iIndex++;
00213     } 
00214     impute(iBeginIndex,iIndex-1, pvProbeSets);
00215 }
00216 
00217 void CNAnalysisMethodGenotype::impute(int iBeginIndex, int iEndIndex, CNProbeSetArray* pvProbeSets )
00218 {
00219 
00220 
00221 
00222     //  We first advance up to the marker with the first valid CN call.
00223     int iIndex = iBeginIndex;
00224     while(iIndex <= iEndIndex  && pvProbeSets->getAt(iIndex)->getCNState()==-1)
00225     {
00226        iIndex++;
00227     }
00228     
00229     // iIndex now points to the first probeset that has a valid called CN state. 
00230     int iFirstValidCNCall=pvProbeSets->getAt(iIndex)->getCNState();
00231 
00232     //  Here we set all the markers up to and including the above first probeset to have an imputed
00233     //  call equal to the called state of that first marker 
00234     for(int iNewIndex=iBeginIndex; iNewIndex <= iIndex; iNewIndex++)
00235     {
00236         pvProbeSets->getAt(iNewIndex)->setImputedCNState(iFirstValidCNCall);
00237     }
00238    
00239 
00240 
00241     //  iPresentBeginIndex points to the marker with a valid CN call.
00242     int iPresentCNState= iFirstValidCNCall;
00243     int iPresentBeginIndex= iIndex;
00244         iIndex++;
00245 
00246     //  The idea of the algorithm is to keep advancing until we find a marker with a valid CN call. This is the second "if" below.
00247     //  We then impute a CN state to all markers up to this new marker with the last CN state. This is the "else" below.
00248     //  Note that at that point iIndex points to the new marker with a valid CN call, so we don't impute a call to it.
00249     //  At the end, we will advance until iIndex points to the last marker in the block we want to impute a CN call to.
00250     //  There are two cases.  Either it has an valid CN state or not.  If it does it is imputed with this value.  If not it
00251     //  get the imputed state equal to the previous valid CN state called.
00252     while(iIndex<=iEndIndex)
00253     {
00254         if(iIndex==iEndIndex)
00255         {
00256             for(int iNewIndex=iPresentBeginIndex; iNewIndex<= iEndIndex-1; iNewIndex++)
00257             {
00258                pvProbeSets->getAt(iNewIndex)->setImputedCNState(iPresentCNState);         
00259             }
00260             if(pvProbeSets->getAt(iIndex)->getCNState() != -1)
00261             {
00262                 pvProbeSets->getAt(iIndex)->setImputedCNState(iPresentCNState);
00263             }
00264             break;
00265         } 
00266            
00267         int iNewCNState=pvProbeSets->getAt(iIndex)->getCNState();
00268         if(iNewCNState==-1 )
00269         {
00270             iIndex++;
00271             continue;
00272         }
00273         else
00274         {
00275             for(int iNewIndex=iPresentBeginIndex; iNewIndex<=iIndex-1; iNewIndex++)
00276             {
00277                pvProbeSets->getAt(iNewIndex)->setImputedCNState(iPresentCNState);         
00278             }
00279             iPresentCNState=pvProbeSets->getAt(iIndex)->getCNState(); 
00280             iPresentBeginIndex=iIndex;
00281             iIndex++; 
00282                
00283         }
00284     }
00285 }
00286 
00287 
00288 void CNAnalysisMethodGenotype::calculateGenotypes()
00289 {
00290     //set("brlmmp-parameters", "CM=2.bins=100.mix=1.bic=2.HARD=3.SB=0.45.KX=1.KH=1.5.KXX=0.5.KAH=-0.6.KHB=-0.6.transform=MVA.AAM=2.0.BBM=-2.0.AAV=0.06.BBV=0.06.ABV=0.06.copyqc=0.wobble=0.05.MS=1")
00291 
00292     bool bCyto2 = ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cyto2")) && (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2")));
00293     snp_param sp;
00294     initializeSnpParameters(sp, 2);
00295     setBrlmmpParameters(sp);
00296 
00297     loadSnpDistributions();
00298 
00299     vector<affx::GType> tcall(1);
00300     vector<double> tconf(1);
00301     vector<double> tx(1);
00302     vector<double> ty(1);
00303     vector<int> GenoHint(1);
00304     vector<double> SubsetInbredPenalty(1);
00305     for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iProbeSetIndex++)
00306     {
00307         CNProbeSet* p = getProbeSets()->getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
00308         if ((bCyto2) && (p->getGenotypeCall() != -1)) {
00309             continue;
00310         }
00311         p->setGenotypeCall(-1);
00312         p->setGenotypeConfidence(0);
00313         if (p->getSnpDistribution() != NULL)
00314         {
00315             snp_param tsp;
00316             tsp.copy(sp); // duplicate current parameters to keep commands
00317             tsp.copynumber = 2; // what copy for this snp so know right model centers
00318             if (getExperiment()->getRawIntensityRatioGenderAsInt() == affx::Male)
00319             {
00320                 if ((p->getChromosome() == m_iXChromosome) && (!p->isPseudoAutosomalRegion() && p->getImputedCNState() == 1)) 
00321                 {
00322                     tsp.copynumber = 1;
00323                 }
00324                 if ((p->getChromosome() == m_iXChromosome) && (!p->isPseudoAutosomalRegion() && p->getImputedCNState() >= 2 )) 
00325                 {
00326                     tsp.copynumber = 2;
00327                 }
00328                 if ((p->getChromosome() == m_iXChromosome) && (!p->isPseudoAutosomalRegion() && p->getImputedCNState() <  1)) 
00329                 {
00330                     tsp.copynumber = 2;
00331                 }
00332                 else // Y Chromosome, Autosome or Par 
00333                 {
00334                         if (p->getChromosome() == m_iYChromosome) 
00335                         {
00336                                 tsp.copynumber = 1;
00337                         }
00338                 }
00339             }
00340             else  // Female
00341             {
00342                 if (p->getChromosome() == m_iYChromosome) {
00343                     continue;
00344                 }
00345             }
00346             tsp.prior.Copy(*p->getSnpDistribution());
00347             // note: using temporary copy of main parameters tsp
00348             tcall[0] = affx::NN;
00349             tconf[0] = 0;
00350             tx[0] = p->getAAlleleSignal();
00351             ty[0] = p->getBAlleleSignal();
00352             GenoHint[0] = -1;
00353             SubsetInbredPenalty[0] = 0; // null parameter
00354             GenoUtility_transformData(tx, ty, MvA, 1);
00355             bayes_label(tcall,tconf,tx,ty,GenoHint,SubsetInbredPenalty,tsp);
00356             p->setGenotypeCall(affx::GType_to_int(tcall[0]));
00357             p->setGenotypeConfidence((float)tconf[0]);
00358         }
00359     }
00360 }

00363 void CNAnalysisMethodGenotype::initializeSnpParameters(snp_param& sp, int iCallMethod)
00364 {
00365     sp.Initialize();
00366     sp.callmethod = iCallMethod;
00367     sp.bins = 100;
00368     sp.mix = 1;
00369     sp.bic = 2;
00370     sp.hardshell = 3;
00371     sp.shellbarrier = 0.45;
00372 
00373     sp.prior.aa.k = 1;
00374     sp.prior.ab.k = 1.5;
00375     sp.prior.bb.k = 1; // bb.k always should = aa.k
00376 
00377     sp.prior.aa.m = 2;
00378     sp.prior.ab.m = 0;
00379     sp.prior.bb.m = -2;
00380 
00381     sp.prior.aa.ss = 0.06;
00382     sp.prior.ab.ss = 0.06;
00383     sp.prior.bb.ss = 0.06;
00384 
00385     sp.prior.aa.v = 10;
00386     sp.prior.ab.v = 10;
00387     sp.prior.bb.v = 10;
00388 
00389     sp.prior.xah = -0.6;
00390     sp.prior.xab = 0.5;
00391     sp.prior.xhb = -0.6;
00392 
00393     sp.copyqc = 0;
00394     sp.wobble = 0.05;
00395 }
00396 
00397 void CNAnalysisMethodGenotype::setBrlmmpParameters(snp_param& sp)
00398 {
00399     string spec = m_pEngine->getOpt("brlmmp-parameters");
00400     if (spec.empty()) {
00401         return;
00402     }
00403     string name;
00404     map<string, string> param;
00405     SelfCreate::fillInNameParam(spec, name, param);
00406 
00407     map<string, string>::iterator iter;
00408     if ((iter = param.find("bins")) != param.end()) {
00409         sp.bins = getInt(iter->second);
00410     }
00411     if ((iter = param.find("mix")) != param.end()) {
00412         sp.mix = getInt(iter->second);
00413     }
00414     if ((iter = param.find("bic")) != param.end()) {
00415         sp.bic = getDouble(iter->second);
00416     }
00417     if ((iter = param.find("HARD")) != param.end()) {
00418         sp.hardshell = getInt(iter->second);
00419     }
00420     if ((iter = param.find("SB")) != param.end()) {
00421         sp.shellbarrier = getDouble(iter->second);
00422     }
00423 
00424     if ((iter = param.find("KX")) != param.end()) {
00425         sp.prior.aa.k = getDouble(iter->second);
00426     }
00427     if ((iter = param.find("KH")) != param.end()) {
00428         sp.prior.ab.k = getDouble(iter->second);
00429     }
00430     sp.prior.bb.k = sp.prior.aa.k; // bb.k always should = aa.k
00431 
00432     if ((iter = param.find("AAM")) != param.end()) {
00433         sp.prior.aa.m = getDouble(iter->second);
00434     }
00435     //sp.prior.ab.m = 0;    // set by initializeSnpParameters() already
00436     if ((iter = param.find("BBM")) != param.end()) {
00437         sp.prior.bb.m = getDouble(iter->second);
00438     }
00439 
00440     if ((iter = param.find("AAV")) != param.end()) {
00441         sp.prior.aa.ss = getDouble(iter->second);
00442     }
00443     if ((iter = param.find("ABV")) != param.end()) {
00444         sp.prior.ab.ss = getDouble(iter->second);
00445     }
00446     if ((iter = param.find("BBV")) != param.end()) {
00447         sp.prior.bb.ss = getDouble(iter->second);
00448     }
00449     // done by initializeSnpParameters() already
00450     //sp.prior.aa.v = 10.0;
00451     //sp.prior.ab.v = 10.0;
00452     //sp.prior.bb.v = 10.0;
00453 
00454     if ((iter = param.find("KAH")) != param.end()) {
00455         sp.prior.xah = getDouble(iter->second);
00456     }
00457     if ((iter = param.find("KXX")) != param.end()) {
00458         sp.prior.xab = getDouble(iter->second);
00459     }
00460     if ((iter = param.find("KHB")) != param.end()) {
00461         sp.prior.xhb = getDouble(iter->second);
00462     }
00463 
00464     if ((iter = param.find("copyqc")) != param.end()) {
00465         sp.copyqc = getDouble(iter->second);
00466     }
00467     if ((iter = param.find("wobble")) != param.end()) {
00468         sp.wobble = getDouble(iter->second);
00469     }
00470 }
00471 void CNAnalysisMethodGenotype::loadSnpDistributions()
00472 {
00473         AffxString strReferenceFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file");
00474         affx::File5_File file5;
00475         affx::File5_Group* group5 = NULL;
00476         affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00477 
00478         file5.open(strReferenceFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00479 
00480         if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cyto2")) && (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2")))
00481         {
00482             group5 = file5.openGroup("Cyto2", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00483             tsv5 = group5->openTsv("SNPPosteriors", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00484         }
00485         else
00486         {
00487             group5 = file5.openGroup("CN5", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00488             tsv5 = group5->openTsv("CN5.snp-posteriors", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00489         }
00490         QuantLabelZ__readSnpPriorMap_tsv5_v2(m_iXChromosome, m_iYChromosome, *getExperiment(), *getProbeSets(), tsv5);
00491         tsv5->close();
00492         delete tsv5;
00493         group5->close();
00494         delete group5;
00495         file5.close();
00496 }
